p: The devastating COVID âˆ’19 led to the social crisis and an economic system failure globally. Post COVID-19 involves complications, lessons learned, immunity, financial loss and preparedness. The only complication of COVID-19 is a type of pneumonia called 2019 novel coronavirus-infected pneumonia (NCIP) in conjunction to ARDS, RNAaemia, acute cardiac injury, and secondary infection associated with other types of corona virus [ 142].
